comments.en:
Multi-function device (printer/copier/fax).

In contrary to other multi-function devices the hardware only supports printing from the PC, not scanning or PC-assisted faxing or copying. Faxing or copying can only be done via the front panel. So it does not make any sense to use HPOJ with this device.

The printing engine of this device is the same as in the monochrome DeskJet 520 printer, so printing will work with various drivers.

This printer has a 600x300-dpi-REt mode which is probably not accessable with free software.
